title: Uchi no Musume ni Te o Dasu na! - Oyako Heroine Funtousu
description: The story follows a super heroine who stepped back and retired a decade ago. She withdrew to a humble life as a homemaker with her daughter. However, her beloved daughter was selected to become the next-generation heroine, so she returns to protect her daughter.

related.title: Uchi no Musume ni Te o Dasu na! - Amazing Eighth Wonder
